title: kulakkoDi tazhaikka
sahitya:
kulakkoDi tazhaikka tiruvaruL kaDaikkaN pAr engaL


anupallavi

  kalakka alai mighu bhavak-kaDalilE kaLi tarum oLi vErEdu nAraNA


caraNam    dIna sharaNyA karuNAkarA kSIra sAgara vihArA harE mAnilam tannil
 enda bhAgyam irundenna maindanen kurai tIr prabhO engaL
